org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.popups

Class MyNotifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.popups.MyNotifications

  • public class MyNotifications
extends java.lang.Object

    This class define routines for displaying various kinds of notifications in OS X style.
    Note that this class can not be used outside of Vaadin requests (threads processing them). The methods defined here work on a so called thread-local pattern.

    TODO: is there a decent way to improve this? To get an instance of underlying UI based on something other than currently running thread? Maybe ResourceRegistrar?

    Author:
    SkyCrawl
